newsitem.title: USA: Chase venture wins United Airlines deal.
newsitem.headline: Chase venture wins United Airlines deal.

text.p: Chase Merchant Services LLC, a joint venture between Chase Manhattan Bank and First Data Corp said Thursday it has agreed to process Visa and MasterCard sales for United Airlines.
The multi-year merchant processing agreement is effective October 1 and includes transaction authorization and processing, settlement and funding services, it said.

The agreement also provides United, a unit of UAL Corp, with access to U$A Value Exchange, a marketing program available only through a limited partnership of financial institutions served by First Data, it said. The program allows merchants to target market to credit card users with special offers, it said.
Chase Manhattan Bank is a unit of Chase Manhattan Corp.
First Data, based in Hackensack, N.J., provides payment systems, electronic commerce and information products and services.
